official_title: A resolution to honor the University of Louisville Cardinals, 1980 National Collegiate Athletic Association.

summary.text: Honors Coach Denny Crum and the University of Louisville Cardinals for winning their first National Collegiate Athletic Association basketball title.

titles.title: A resolution to honor the University of Louisville Cardinals, 1980 National Collegiate Athletic Association.
